mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum as recNum ,pro_boardNum ,pro_noticeNum ,pro_kind ,pro_gender ,pro_age ,pro_place ,pro_findDate ,pro_character ,pro_neutering ,pro_registNum ,pro_state ,pro_shelter ,pro_img ,pro_date ,user_id from ( select pro_boardNum ,pro_noticeNum ,pro_kind ,pro_gender ,pro_age ,pro_place ,pro_findDate ,pro_character ,pro_neutering ,pro_registNum ,pro_state ,pro_shelter ,pro_img ,pro_date ,user_id from pro_board ) ) where recNum BETWEEN (#{section}-1)*100+(#{pageNum}-1)*10+1 and (#{section}-1)*100+#{pageNum}*10
SELECT title FROM pro_board WHERE (PRO_KIND LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') or (PRO_DATE LIKE '%' || #{searchDate} || '%') ORDER BY pro_date DESC

SELECT P.* FROM pro_board P WHERE (P.PRO_KIND LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%') or (P.PRO_DATE LIKE '%' || #{searchDate} || '%') or (P.PRO_PLACE LIKE '%' || #{searchPlace} || '%') ORDER BY P.pro_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pro_board (pro_boardNum, pro_noticeNum, pro_kind, pro_gender, pro_age, pro_place, pro_findDate, pro_character, pro_neutering, pro_registNum, pro_state, pro_shelter, pro_img, user_id) VALUES (#{pro_boardNum}, #{pro_noticeNum}, #{pro_kind}, #{pro_gender}, #{pro_age}, #{pro_place}, #{pro_findDate}, #{pro_character}, #{pro_neutering}, #{pro_registNum}, #{pro_state}, #{pro_shelter}, null, #{user_id})

insert.foreach: INTO t_imageFile (imageFileNo,imageFileName, pro_boardNum, regDate) VALUES (#{item.imageFileNo}, #{item.imageFileName}, #{item.pro_boardNum}, sysdate)
